wikipedia_page.main: John David Knowles (1941 – 26 January 2011) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He played for Halifax Town, Bury and Bradford City.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players (1–49 league appearances)

response: * 26 January 2011 – David Knowles, 69, former Bradford City goalkeeper.
